backupOptions.description: Specifies the backup option for a selected resource. This option is only available for Windows VSS backup jobs. Set to `{ WindowsVSS = "enabled" }` to enable Windows VSS backup option and create a VSS Windows backup.

resourceType.description: The type of AWS resource to be backed up. For VSS Windows backups, the only supported resource type is Amazon EC2. Valid values: `EC2`.
